alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:59AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM CDT... At 258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Meadow Brook, to 10 miles southeast of Togo, to 12 miles north of Keewatin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Meadow Brook around 305 AM CDT. Gheen around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cook, Lake Vermilion and Mountain Iron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis
